message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $180. I think you'll find it's a steal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I believe I can come up with a fair price of $150 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm looking for something closer to $170.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I understand your perspective on the product's value. I would like to propose a price of $160 for the product.
